turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Hi. I wanted to order a drink to go pick up at the Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, let me set that up for you. Which Starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Salt Lake City on 3300 Salsa Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I want to get a Venti iced white chocolate mocha with whole milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome. I have you down for 1 venti iced white Chocolate Mocha with Whole milk and Whipped Cream from the Starbucks in salt lake city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total for your order, should I place it now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. I've sent the order in. It'll be ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That will do it. Thank you very much.
